name: Tackle
all_locations: Mountain View, CA, USA; Santa Clara, CA, USA
long_description: Tackle is a time tracking & auditing tool designed for high-performing founders and top executives. It automatically tracks and analyzes calendar activities, giving insights to keep day-to-day work aligned with big-picture goals. Tackle helps leaders focus on what truly matters and drive impactful results.
one_liner: AI-powered time insights to keep your focus on what matters most
